subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 38 points, and Russell Westbrook added 29 points and 10 rebounds as the Oklahoma City Thunder erased a 14-point deficit and held on to beat the host Orlando Magic, 105-102.
snippet: Kevin Durant scored 38 points, and Russell Westbrook added 29 points and 10 rebounds as the Oklahoma City Thunder erased a 14-point deficit and held on to beat the host Orlando Magic, 105-102.
